Yawan cutar Coronavirus (COVID-19) da ke ci gaba da karuwa a cikin European Union/European Economic Area da United Kingdom, 1 Janairu zuwa 15 Maris 2020

Yawan cutar coronavirus (COVID-19) ya yi kama da yadda yake faruwa a kasashe masu shiga kungiyar kasashen yammacin Turai da kuma Ingila wanda ya tabbatar da cewa, kodayake a cikin yanayi daban-daban, cutar COVID-19 tana ci gaba cikin tsawon lokaci a duk kasashe.

A kan nasarar daga Italiya, kasashe, asibitocin da sashen kulawa mai zurfi suna da alhakin sauya shawarar su don sauya shawarar su don sauya shawarar su don sauya shawarar su don sauya shawarar su don sauya shawarar su don sauya shawarar su don sauya shawarar su don sauya shawarar su don sauya shawarar su don sauya shawarar su don sauya shawarar su don sauya shawarar su don sauya shawarar su don sauya shawarar su don sauya shawarar su don sauya shawarar su don sauya shawarar su don sauya shawarar su don sauya shawarar su don sauya shawarar su don sauya shawarar su don sauya shawarar su don sauya shawarar su don sauya shawarar su don sauya shawarar su don sauya shawarar su don sauya shawarar su don sauya shawarar su don sauya shawarar su don sauya shawarar su don sauya shawarar su don sauya shawarar su don sauya shawarar su don sauya shawarar su don sauya shawarar su don sauya shawarar su don sauya shawarar su don sauya shawarar su don sauya shawarar su don sauya shawarar su don sauya shawarar su don sauya shawarar su don sauya shawarar su don sauya shawarar su don sauya shawar
A ranar 31 ga Disamba 2019, an yi rahoton cikakkun cututtukan sanyi da ainihin ainihin ainihin a wuhan, Hubei Province, China.

A ranar 9 ga Janairu, 2020, Cibiyar Kula da Cututtuka da Tsarewa ta China ta bayyana cutar da ta haifar da a matsayin cutar coronavirus ta farko wacce ake kira a yanzu severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2).
Kamar yadda, rashin lafiya daga kamuwa da cutar SARS-CoV-2 ta kasance sunan cutar coronavirus (COVID-19).
Shaida ta yanzu ce cewa ca 80% na mutanen da ke da COVID-19 suna da mummunan cutar, i.e. cutar nunfashi ta jiki da ko da yake da nimoniya, da kuma yawancin su suka samu nasarar samuwa.
A cikin kashi 14% na halayen, COVID-19 ya zama cikin cutar da ke buƙatar kama gado a asibiti, yayin da sauran kashi 6% na halayen suna da cutar da ke buƙatar kulawar tsananin.
Mutuwar marasa lafiya da aka ajiye saboda COVID-19 ita ce 4%.

A cikin wannan binciken, muna tantance tsawon lokaci da adadin COVID-19 a kowace ƙasa ta European Union/European Economic Area (EU/EEA) da Burtaniya (UK) da kuma su kawo su cikin alaƙa da Hubei Province, China.
Kuma muna kawance adadin COVID-19 na yanzu a kasashen EU/EEA da Burtaniya da shi a Italiya a cikin 31 ga watan Janairu zuwa 15 ga watan Maris shekarar 2020.
Shari'o'in COVID-19 a kasashen EU/EEA da Burtaniya
Bayan China, COVID-19 ya yi yaduwa a yankunan duniya kuma yanayin cutar COVID-19 a yankunan duniya da ke cikin yanayin yau da kullun yana daidaita da wannan kasar.
A ranar 11 ga Maris, 2020, Shugaban Kungiyar Lafiya ta Duniya (WHO) ya ayyana COVID-19 a matsayin annoba.

A cikin 5 Maris na shekarar 2020, Spiteri da sauran su sun bayyana a cikin Eurosurveillance 2020, wanda ya bayyana a cikin 5 Maris na shekarar 2020, Spiteri da sauran su sun bayyana a cikin Eurosurveillance 2020, wanda ya bayyana a cikin Eurosurveillance 2020, wanda ya bayyana a cikin Eurosurveillance 2020, wanda ya bayyana a cikin Eurosurveillance 2020, wanda ya bayyana a cikin Eurosurveillance 2020, wanda ya bayyana a cikin Eurosurveillance 2020, wanda ya bayyana a cikin Eurosurveillance 2020, wanda ya bayyana a cikin Eurosurveillance 2020, wanda ya bayyana a cikin Eurosurveillance 2020, wanda ya bayyana a cikin Eurosurveillance 2020, wanda ya bayyana a cikin Eurosurveillance 2020, wanda ya bayyana a cikin Eurosurveillance 2020, wanda ya bayyana a cikin Eurosurveillance 2020, wanda ya bayyana a cikin Eurosurveillance 2020, wanda ya bayyana a cikin Eurosurveillance 2020, wanda ya bayyana a cikin Eurosurveillance 2020, wanda ya bayyana a cikin Eurosurveillance 2020, wanda ya bayyana a cikin Eurosurveillance 2020, wanda ya bayyana a cikin Eurosurveillance 2020, wanda ya bayyana a cikin Eurosur
A cikin EU/EEA, an ba da rahoton farko na biyu na tabacin gwajin da aka yi a watan Janairu na shekarar 2020 a Faransa a cikin mutanen da suka dawo daga Wuhan, Hubei Province, China.

A ranar 15 ga Maris 2020, an gano cutar COVID-19 a duk 30 kasashen EU/EEA da Birtaniya (UK), inda tsakanin 31 Disamba 2019 zuwa wannan ranar, an bayyana 39,768 lokuta da kuma mutuwar mutane 1,727, tare da 17,750 lokuta da kuma mutuwar mutane 1,441 daga Italiya kawai.
Samun adadin jimlar da jimlar ragi na lokuta da COVID-19

A cikin Kungiyar Kula da Kariya daga Cuta na Turai (ECDC), adadin lamarin COVID-19 da aka bayyana a kowace ƙasa a duniya, wanda aka samu daga kawai sassan hukumomin jama'a kamar Ma'aikatar Lafiya, hukumomin jama'a da na yanki da kuma Hukumar Lafiya Ta Duniya, ana saita kowace rana a 8:00 a.m.
Bayanan da aka yi amfani dashi don yin bayyana yawan COVID-19 a EU/EEA da Birtaniya, da kuma yin bayyana su ga Italiya.

A matsayin wakilin yawan shari'ar COVID-19 masu aiki, muka ƙididdige 14-​-rabin tsawon lokaci na yawan shari'ar COVID-19, don haka, ya ƙunshi aikin ƙarshe na COVID-19, a cikin kowace ƙasa ta EU/EEA da Burtaniya, a cikin lokacin 1 Janairu-15 Maris 2020.
Kuma muka gabatar da jimillar karar masu yiwuwa na kowace ƙasa a ranar 15 Maris 2020 8:00 a.m. kamar yadda aka bayyana a Italiya a cikin lokacin 31 Janairu–15 Maris 2020.
Tasirin COVID-19 a kasashen EU/EEA da Burtaniya
Tasirin 14-day truncated cumulative incidence na cutar COVID-19 a kasashen EU/EEA da Burtaniya ya yi kama da na Hubei Province (China) (Hoto 1).
A cikin EU/EEA da Burtaniya a karkashin kungiyar, yawan cutar COVID-19 ya fara yaduwa a kusa da 21 ga watan Fabrairu kuma ya ci gaba da yaduwa a kusa da 28 ga watan Fabrairu 2020.

Wannan ya kasance galibi ne saboda ingantaccen karuwar adadin wadanda aka ruwaito daga italiya, amma duk kasashe da ke cikin EU/EEA da ingila sun nuna ayyukan karuwar adadin cutar ta COVID-19 (Supplementary material).
Farin jikin 2 yana nuna adadin COVID-19, a cikin kasashen EU/EEA da Burtaniya da kuma Italiya don lokacin 31 ga Janairu zuwa 15 ga Maris 2020.

Yana nuna cewa, a ranar 15 ga Maris 8:00 a.m., kasashe 15 na EU/EEA da Ingila suka yi rahoton jimillar kwayoyin cutar da suka yi kamar da Italiya a ranar 3 da suka gabata ko kuma a lokacin da suka gabata.
Bayanan mu sun nuna cewa jimlar marasa lafiya da aka tabbatar da COVID-19 ya karu cikin tsananin tsari a cikin EU/EEA da Birtaniya.
Yadda ke faruwa a cikin haɗarin COVID-19 yana nuna cewa annobar ya yi tafiya a cikin tsawon lokaci a duk kasashe.

Dole ne saboda kasashen da ke cikin lokutan daban-daban, bambance-bambance a cikin ayyukan kiwon lafiya na ƙasa, da sauran bambance-bambance a cikin ƙasashe da ayyukan da aka zaɓa a cikin ƙasashe don amincewa da COVID-19.

A farkon Maris 2020, likitocin yankunan da ke cikin yanayin Italiya sun bayyana yanayin wanda kashi 10% na masu cutar CoVID-19 suna buƙatar kulawa mai zurfi da manufofin labarai sun bayyana cewa asibitocin da sashin buƙatar tsananin kulawar kama gado a cikin wannan yankin suna cikin yanayin da ba za a iya amfani da shi ba.
Bayanai game da shiga COVID-19 a cikin asibiti da/ko sashin buƙatar tsananin kulawar kama gado ba su kasance kawai a cikin 6% da 1% lokuta, bi da bi (data ba a nuna ba).
Suna, kuma, ana iya tattara su a cikin tsari don tabbatar da bayanai na bincike na yanzu da suka shafi adadin wadanda aka ruwaito da adadin mutanen da suka mutu.

Binciken da aka yi a cikin 2010-11 ya nuna bambanta da yawa a cikin ayyukan kula da lafiya da ayyukan kula da lafiya a cikin Turai, daga 29.2 a cikin Jamus zuwa 4.2 cikin 100,000 na yawan jama'a a Portugal.

Wannan yana nufin cewa kasashen da ke cikin yankuna na iya da kudaden shiga ko kuma da kudaden shiga fiye da Italiya (12.5 intensive care and intermediate care beds per 100,000 population in 2010–11).

Matsakaicin shirye-shiryen da ke da alaƙa da ingantaccen aikin lafiya, tare da bayyana takamaiman ga kowace ƙasa ta EU/EEA da Burtaniya na mafi girman yawan cutar COVID-19 a cikin asibiti wanda ke da alaƙa da > 90% haɗarin yin kama da ingantaccen aikin lafiya, ana bayyana a cikin ƙarshe na biyu na ECDC rapid risk assessment na COVID-19.

Bayan haka, a cikin kasashe da ke cikin EU/EEA da Birtaniya, lamarin da aka gano har yanzu ya ƙunshi ƙungiyoyin da ke cikin ƙasashe da ke cikin EU/EEA da Birtaniya, da kuma asibitocin da ke cikin ƙasashe da ke cikin EU/EEA da Birtaniya, da kuma asibitocin da ke cikin ƙasashe da ke cikin EU/EEA da Birtaniya, da kuma asibitocin da ke cikin ƙasashe da ke cikin EU/EEA da Birtaniya, da kuma asibitocin da ke cikin ƙasashe da ke cikin EU/EEA da Birtaniya, da kuma asibitocin da ke cikin ƙasashe da ke cikin EU/EEA da Birtaniya, da kuma asibitocin da ke cikin ƙasashe da ke cikin EU/EEA da Birtaniya, da kuma asibitocin da ke cikin ƙasashe da ke cikin EU/EEA da Birtaniya, da kuma asibitocin da ke cikin ƙasashe da ke cikin EU/EEA da Birtaniya, da kuma asibitocin da ke cikin ƙasashe da ke cikin EU/EEA da Birtaniya, da kuma asibitocin da ke cikin ƙasas

A cikin wannan yanayin, babu wani abu da zai iya cikakken sa ido kan cutar virology za su tattara samfurorin jini daga marasa lafiya da ke zuwa cikin al’adar gwajin jini na yau da kullun.

Annobar cutar coronavirus ta 2019 (COVID-19), wanda aka samu a cikin cututtukan fata (SARS) coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2), ya kashe mutane sama da 3,000 kuma ya kamuwa da mutane sama da 80,000 a Sin da sauran duniya, wanda ya haifar da nasarar mutane.

Irinsu da kwayar cutar ta SARS-CoV, wacce ta haifar da SARS a cikin mutane da dama a shekarar 2003, SARS-CoV-2 kuma zai iya yaduwa daga jemagu da kuma haifar da alamomin iri iri a cikin hanyar iri iri.
Duk da haka, COVID-19 yana da ƙarfi da mutuwa fiye da SARS amma yana da yaduwa fiye da SARS da MERS.

A cikin mayar da martani ga karuwar yawan bayanai da aka buga game da cutar da ke faruwa, wannan rubutu ya yi ƙoƙari don bayar da bayanin daidaitaccen da kuma bayanin daidaitaccen bayanin aikin bincike da ke ci gaba.
Zamu hada bayanin da aka yi game da epidemiology, etiology, virology, diagnosis, treatment, prognosis, da kuma ci gaba da cin zarafin cutar.
Koda yake akwai wasu tambayoyi da suka shafi jawabai, muna fatan cewa wannan bincike zai taimaka wajen fahimtar da rage cutar da ke cikawa.

Hutun bazara na 25 ga Janairu, 2020 ya zama abin tunawa da farko da abin tunawa da kowa da kowa da Sinawa wadanda suka shirya su zauna a cikin gida don duk lokacin hutu da sauran matsakaicin daga baya saboda barkewar cutar da ke faruwa.

Kwayar cutar ita ce ta daidaita da kwayar cutar coronavirus (CoV) wacce ta samar da barkewar cutar sankarau mai yawa (SARS) a shekarar 2003; don haka, Hukumar Kula da Lafiya ta Duniya (WHO) ta ba da sunan SARS-CoV-2 a ranar 11 ga watan Fabrairu shekarar 2020, kuma cutar da ke da alaƙa da ita ta kasance CoV Disease-19 (COVID-19).
Cutar ta fara ne a Wuhan, China, amma ta yadu cikin tsawon lokaci a duk kasar da sauran kasashe da dama a duniya.
ya zuwa ga Maris 2, 2020, cutar ta haifar da kashi 80,000 na lokuta masu COVID-19, tare da kusan 40,000 masu zanga-zangar da kuma kusan 3,000 masu mutuwa.
WHO ya bayyana cewa COVID-19 shine "kasa da kasa na farko" kuma yana da tasiri mai yawa fiye da tashe-tashen hankula.

A cikin PubMed (https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/), a cikin kwanaki biyu da suka gabata, fiye da 200 rahotanni sun fitarwa game da COVID-19 ciki har da virology, epidemiology, etiology, diagnosis, da kuma ilmantarwa daga bayanin farko a ranar 7 ga watan Janairu, 2020 wanda ya tsara jerin cutar da aka warewa daga masu cutar da dama.
Wannan kwalliyar ta yi ƙoƙari a cikin cikakken bayyana ci gaban bincike a cikin yanki na musamman da ke ci gaba da haɓaka.
A lokacin da zamu iya, za mu iya kawo COVID-19 tare da SARS da kuma cutar da ta shafi CoV, Middle East respiratory syndrome (MERS, an outbreak in 2012).
Zamu kuma yi magana game da abubuwan da muka samu har yanzu game da ci gaba da ingancin cutar da kuma wasu tambayoyi masu zuwa da kuma aiki.
CoVs an san su a matsayin cututtukan da suka kasance a cikin ƙarshe ga ɗaya daga cikin cututtukan ƙarshe 4.

Amma a wannan shekaru, muka samu cututtukan CoV na mutum da ke da lafiya da yawa, i.e., SARS COV da MERS COV, waɗanda suka haifar da cutar a China a 2003 da Saudi Arabia a 2012, bi da bi, kuma suka tashi zuwa wasu ƙasashe da dama da lafiya da mutuwa.
Saboda haka, COVID-19 na yanzu shine barkewar CoV na uku a tarihin mutane.
Kamar yadda aka nuna a cikin ƙirar ​ƙirar 1, ƙungiyoyin cutar sanyi da ke da asalin da ba a san shi ba an fara bayyana daga Wuhan a ranar 31 ga Disamba, 2019 zuwa Majalisar Lafiya ta China.
Bayan kwanaki 7 aka fitar da jerin CoV.
A ranar 15 ga watan Janairu, 2020, an bayyana wanda ya mutu na farko daga Wuhan.
A cikin wannan lokacin, cutar ta yi yaduwa zuwa biranen da ke cikin kusa, jihar da kasashe.
A ranar Janairu 20, an bayyana cutar lafiya ta masu kula da lafiya, yana nuna cewa yaduwa daga mutum zuwa mutum zai iya yiwuwa.
A ranar 23 ga watan Janairu, birnin Wuhan an kulle shi da zirga-zirgar jama'a.

A ranar 24 ga watan Janairu, an bayyana cewa, daga cikin mutanen 41 da aka tabbatar da kamuwa da cutar, kawai 21 ke da hada jiki da kasuwar kaya da aka yi imanin cewa ita ce wurin farawa na kamuwa da cutar daga wani abu da ba a san shi.
A ranar 30 ga watan Janairu, Kungiyar Lafiya ta Duniya ta ayyana annobar a matsayin annoba ta lafiya ta duniya.
A lokacin da ake rubuta wannan rahoton, cutar ta yadu a duk China da kuma kusan 50 kasashe da dama a duniya.
Kamar yadda yanayin yanzu ya fara canzawa, tsarin da tsananin yaduwar cutar za su zama ana ƙididdige su.

A ranar 11 ga Fabrairu, 2020, bincike na kungiyoyi da dama kan 8,866 marasa lafiya da suka hada da 4,021 marasa lafiya masu tabbatar da COVID-19 sun gabatar da bayanin daidaitaccen bayanin annoba kamar haka (https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s/UlBi-HX_rHPXa1qHA2bhdA).
Mutane masu cutar SARS-CoV-2 a duk shekaru, amma kawai a shekaru 30-65.

Kashi kasa (47.7%) na masu kamu da cutar suna da shekaru 50 ko sama da haka, kashi daidai (kashi 2.3%) suna da shekaru 20 ko sama da haka, kuma kashi 14 na masu kamu da cutar suna da shekaru 10 ko sama da haka.
SARS-CoV-2 ya shafe maza (0.31/100,000) fi mace (0.27/100,000).
COVID-19 ya ƙaruwa a gungun kawai a cikin da kusa da Hubei.
CVID-19 ya yi daidai da kwanaki 5 (2-9) daga farkon farawa zuwa tabbatarwa.
Lokacin rufewa na ƙarshe shine 4.8 (3.0-7.2).
Tsawon lokaci daga farawa zuwa mutuwa ita ce 9.5 (4.8-13) kwanaki.
R0 na asali (R0) ya kasance 3.77 (95% CI: 3.51-4.05), da kuma R0 na ƙayyadaddun 2.23-4.82.
Bayan 23 ga Janairu, 2020, yawan masu kamu da cutar ya karu cikin karfi, ya kammala lokacin da aka yi amfani da jiragen ruwa a lokacin bazara a kasar Sin.
Mutuwar marasa lafiya da aka tabbatar sun kasance 1.44% (95% CI: 1.10-1.86%), da mutuwar da aka dogara da kowane marasa lafiya 3.06% (95% CI: 2.02-4.59%).
Dalilai biyu na farko masu haɗari ga COVID-19 ne kawai (maza), shekara (≥60), da pneumonia mai mummunan mummunan.
CoVs suna ƙarƙashin iyali na ƙwayoyin cuta masu ƙarfi da ƙwayoyin cuta masu ɓoyewa wanda ke da nau'in halittar RNA ɗaya.
Ana iya rarraba su zuwa hudu, i.e., alpha, beta, gamma, da delta, daga cikinsu alpha- da beta-CoVs ana sanin su suka kama mutane.

Ambulaf na kwayar cutar spike (S) glycoprotein ya hada da madaukinsa na cellular angiotensin-converting enzyme 2 (ACE2) da dipeptidyl peptidase 4 (DPP4) don SARS-CoV da MERS-CoV, kuma kuma an yi fusion na membrane.

Kwayar halittar RNA na kwayar cutar ana ɗaure a cikin cytoplasm; bayan kamanceceniya na kwayar halittar kwayar cutar, genomic RNA tare da glycoproteins na ambulaf da sunadarai na nucleocapsid suna haɗa da vesicles na virion, wanda kuma ya haɗa da plasma membrane don ɗaure kwayar cutar.
Bayanin genoma na farko na SARS-CoV-2 an bayyana a ranar 10 ga watan Janairu shekarar 2020.

SARS-CoV-2 an tabbatar da shi a matsayin nau'in beta-CoV na musamman da kashi 99.98% cikakken zane-zane tsakanin 10 samfuran da aka tattara daga wurin farko na yaduwar cutar, kasuwancin kayan ruwa na Huanan a Wuhan.
SARS-CoV-2 yana da alaƙa da SARS-CoV fiye da MERS-CoV.

An gano ACE2 na ɗan adam a matsayin ɗaya daga cikin ɗakuna don SARS-CoV-2 da kuma SARS-CoV.
Kodayake, S protein na SARS-CoV-2 yana bin da ACE2 na mutum da sauri fiye da na SARS-CoV, wanda ke da alaƙa da shi cewa SARS-CoV-2 ya haifar da cutar da ƙarfi fiye da SARS-CoV.
SARS-CoV-2 kuma zai iya ƙirƙirar protein ɗan gajeren sabon wanda aka ƙirƙiri ta orf3b da kuma protein na sirri wanda aka ƙirƙiri ta orf8.
Orf3b na SARS-CoV-2 ya iya taka muhimmiyar rawa a cikin barkewar cutar da kuma ya hana bayyana IFNβ; amma orf8 bai ƙunshi ƙarfin ƙarfi ko ƙarfi ɗaya ba.
A ranar 18 ga Fabrairu, 2020, Zhou, et al., sun bayyana tsarin cryo-EM na ACE2 na dan adam na ƙarshe a 2.9 Å a cikin yanayin da aka yi amfani da shi da B0AT1.

Sannan suka samu cewa hadaddun shine, wanda ya ƙunshi ƙarin da ƙarshe, ana ƙirƙirar shi a matsayin dimer da hadaddun ACE2-B0AT1 yana iya ɗaukar biyu na S proteins, wanda ke nuna bayani ga CoV saniya da cutar.
B0AT1 zai zama babban takamaiman maganin da za a yi amfani da shi don hana kamuwa da cutar SARS-CoV-2.

Ta hanyar karatun phylogenetic na SARS-CoV-2 da sauran CoVs, jemagen an yi la'akari da shi a matsayin mai haɗin gwiwa na SARS-CoV-2 a matsayin babban virus na 96% da sauran SARS-like CoVs daga jemagen da ake kira bat-SL-CoVZX45 da bat-SL-CoVZX21.
Kodayake, wani chudanya da ya taimaka wa kwayar cutar ta kai tsaye zuwa tsarin jinsi don kamuwa da mutane ba a sani ba, da hanyar yaduwa ba a bayyana ba.

Tsakani kamuwa da cuta da bayyanan alamar cutan (lokacin girma) na SARS-CoV-2 shine kwanaki 1-14, kamar yadda akwai 3-7 kwanaki, a cikin binciken farko na 425 lamura a Wuhan.
Bugu da kari, aikin da aka yi kan 1,099 lokuta ya nuna cewa tsawon lokacin da ake da kwayar cutar ita ce awanni 3 a kowane lokaci kuma ya kasance daga 0 zuwa 24 kwanaki.

Babban bincike da aka yi a cikin wannan lokacin, kamar yadda aka bayyana a cikin wannan, yana nuna cewa lokacin da aka yi aiki ya kasance 4.8 (3.0-7.2) kwanaki da ke da alaƙa da demography na 8,866 na masu cutarwa.

Zazzabi na iya zama babban alamar COVID-19, wanda zai iya haɗa da alamar ko alamun sauran alamun kamar tari, karancin numfashi, ciwon wuya, ciwon kai, ciwon kai, ciwon makogwaro, ciwon makogwaro, ciwon makogwaro, ciwon makogwaro, ciwon makogwaro, ciwon makogwaro, ciwon makogwaro, ciwon makogwaro, ciwon makogwaro, ciwon makogwaro, ciwon makogwaro, ciwon makogwaro, ciwon makogwaro, ciwon makogwaro, ciwon makogwaro, ciwon makogwaro, ciwon makogwaro, ciwon makogwaro, ciwon makogwaro, ciwon makogwaro, ciwon makogwaro, ciwon makogwaro, ciwon makogwaro, ciwon makogwaro, ciwon makogwaro, ciwon makogwaro, ciwon makogwaro, ciwon makogwaro, ciwon makogwaro, ciwon makogwaro, ciwon makogwaro, ciwon makogwaro, ciwon makogwaro, ciwon makogwaro, ciwon makogwaro, ciwon makogwaro, ciwon makogwaro, ciwon makogwaro, ciwon makogwaro, ciwon makogwaro, ciwon makogwaro, ciwon makogwaro, ciwon makogwaro, ciwon makogwaro, ciwon makogwaro, ciwon makogwaro, ciwon makogwaro, ciwon makogwaro
Wasu marasa lafiya suna da alamu masu laushi, masu kama da mura.
A cikin matsanancin yanayin, masu lafiya sun yi karuwa zuwa haɓaka ciwo mai ratsa jiki, ciwo mai ratsa jiki, acidosis metabolic, da coagulopathy.
Marasa lafiya da ke da zazzabi da/ko alamun cututtukan matsananciyar cutar da cutar zazzafi, ba tare da bayyana abubuwan da ke cikin hankali ba, za a kiyaye shi don nuna cutar don nuna cewa.

Binciken al'adu a watan Disamba na 2019 ya nuna cewa ƙimar alamun sun haɗa da 98% don zazzabi, 76% don bushe tari, 55% don dyspnea, da 3% don diarrhea; 8% na masu lafiya sun yi amfani da taimakon ventilation.
wannan na nufin rahoton da aka yi a cikin wasu binciken da aka yi a cikin shekarar da ta gabata a cikin kungiyar dangi da kuma kungiyar da aka samu daga yaduwara daga mutum da ya yi yawa.
A cikin 2012, binciken demography ya nuna cewa masu cutar MERS-CoV suna da zazzabi (98%), bushe tari (47%), da gajiya (55%) a matsayinsu na alamun mafi girma.
Amma kashi 80% na suka buƙatar taimakon ventilation, da yawa fiye da marasa lafiya na COVID-19 da ke daidai da haɗarin mafi girma na MERS fiye da COVID-19.
Diarrhea (26%) da ciwon makogwaro (21%) kuma an nuna su tare da masu cutar MERS.

A cikin masu cutar SARS, an nuna cewa zazzabi (99%-100%), ciwon makogwaro (29%-75%), ciwon jiki (40%-42%), gudawa (20-25%), da ciwon makogwaro (13-25%) ne suka kasance alamun manya da kuma taimakon hawa ya buƙata ga kusan 14%-20% na masu cutar.
A ranar 14 ga watan Fabrairu, mutanen da suka mutu saboda cutar COVID-19 sun kai kashi 2% lokacin da aka tabbatar da mutanen da suka kamu da cutar 66,576 a duniya.

Rashin lafiya da haɗari: Masu cutar COVID-19 da ke buƙatar harkar gaggawa suna da alaƙa da cutar lafiya ta hanyar haɗari da haɗari.
Yana da alaƙa da cutar zuciya ne kuma shi ne mafi ƙarancin dalilin mutuwa a cikin masu cutar SARS.
An bayyana cewa SARS-CoV-2 kuma zai iya shiga ACE2-positive cholangiocytes, wanda zai iya haifar da cututtukan ciyawa a cikin cutar COVID-19.
Ko da yake, tsufa da yanayin rashin lafiya suna da alaƙa mai girma kuma zai iya haifar da haɗari.

Abnormal laboratory findings: The C-reactive protein (CRP) level in blood reflects the severity of inflammation or tissue injury and has been proposed to be a potential prognostic factor for disease, response to therapy, and ultimate recovery.
Kuma an bayyana alaƙar matakin CRP zuwa tsananin da nuna COVID-19.

Duk da haka, an ruwaito cewa jemagu masu kaya daga cikin daji ko masu kaya da ba su da haɗari ga masana'antar dabbobi masu rayuwa ba su kasance mafi girma don SARS-CoV, wanda ya nuna cewa jemagu masu kaya ba su iya zama tafkin dabi'a na SARS-CoV ba.

Kamar yadda 80% na dabbobai daban-daban a kasuwar Guangzhou suna da abubuwan da suka haifar da cututtukan SARS-CoV, ba za a iya cire shawarar cewa dabbobai daban-daban na dabbobai masu girma na tsakanin ba.
Duk waɗannan suna da alama suna cikin haɗari ga COVID-19.

Babban bincike don mutum na asali na SARS-CoV ya nuna jemagen CoV da ke da alaƙa da SARS-CoV, da ake kira SARS-related Rhinolophus bat CoV HKU3 (SARSr-Rh-BatCoV HKU3), wanda ke da alaƙa da Chinese horseshoe bats.
An gano waɗannan ƙwayoyin da suke da rigakafin anti-SARS-CoV da genome na SARSr-Rh-BatCoV HKU3.
Wannan da sauran bat CoVs suna da 88-92% homology na nukleotide da SARS Cov.
Wannan bincike ya kafa asusun daidaitaccen bayyana cewa jemagu suna dauke da cututtukan da ke fitowa daga mutane.
Kamar yadda akwai SARS-like CoVs (SL-CoVs) da aka sani daga jemagen, amma ba kowane ba sai wani wanda aka bayyana a matsayin WIV1 zai iya zubar da kwayar a matsayin kwayar cuta.
Mai karɓar enzyme 2 na angiotensin na mutum (ACE2) an san shi a matsayin mai karɓar SARS-CoV.
WIV1 ya samo asali ne daga samfurin jini na jemagen ya nuna amfani da jemagen, civet da mutane ACE2 a matsayin mai amfani don shiga cikin cell.
Kamar yadda, sera na masu warkewa na SARS su na iya neutralizing WIV1.
Kamar yadda yake, WIV1 yana wakiltar mafi kusa dangatakar SARS-COV a cikin jemagen, ya daidaita 95% cikakkiyar homology na DNA.
Ba da daɗewa da daɗewa ba, an yi imanin cewa WIV1 ba shi ne ƙwayar mahaifa ta farko na SARS-CoV da jemagu ba shi ne tafkin dabi'a na farko na SARS-CoV.

Bangladesh ya bayyana cewa an kashe mutane biyar a cikin wannan rana saboda COVID-19, mafi girman rana
A ranar da ta gabata, Bangladesh ta tabbatar da mutuwar mutane biyar saboda COVID-19 a ranar.
Wannan ita ce kashi mafi girma na mutanen da suka mutu a rana saboda cutar.

A ranar da ta gabata, Bangladesh's Institute of Epidemiology, Disease Control and Research (IEDCR) ta bayyana cewa jimlar masu kamu da cutar da aka tabbatar sun haɗa da mutane 114 masu aiki da kuma mutane 33 masu tsira da ke zaune a gida.
Jimlar mutuwar mutane 17 an nuna.
A taron labarai na yanar gizo, shugaban IEDCR, Dr. Meerjady Sabrina Flora, ya ce mutanen da suka mutu sun hada da mata da maza hudu.
Kamar yadda Dr Meerjady ya bayyana, biyu suna da shekaru da dama 60, biyu tsakanin 51 da 60, kuma daya 41-50 shekaru.

Kodayake, cutar ta kai lokacin yaduwa a cikin jama'a a yankunan duniya da dama.

Wannan na nuna cewa kwayar cutar tana yaduwa a cikin al'umma, kuma yawancin membobin al'umma ba su san inda ko yadda suka kamu da cutar. Masu lafiya da suka ba da shawara ga mutane da suka iya kamuwa da cutar suna amincewa da aikace-aikacen daidaitaccen, aikace-aikacen kai, da aikace-aikacen mataki. WHO ta bayyana umarnin da ta yi kan lokacin da ake amfani da masu sanya fuska.

Kamar yadda Stephen Griffin, virologist a Jami'ar Leeds, "Amfani da kaya ya sa mutane suka daina taɓawa hannun su, wanda shine babban yanayi na kamuwa da cuta ba tare da lafiyar hannu daidai ba." Kaya kuma ana amincewa da amfani da shi don amfani da wani da ke gudanar da wani da ke da cutar.

Hukumar lafiya ta duniya ta shawarta sanya takunkumin fuska a cikin mutane masu lafiya kawai idan suna cikin haɗari, kamar masu kulawa da mutum da ke dauke da COVID-19, amma kuma suka tabbatar da cewa sanya takunkumin fuska zai iya sa mutane su guji taba kariyar fuska.
Kungiyoyin da dama sun fara goyan bayan amfani da abin rufe fuskoki da ake amfani da shi a cikin jama'a.

A cikin Amurka, CDC ya amince da sanya takunkumin fuska da aka yi a cikin gini.China ya amince da amfani da takunkumin fuska na likita da aka yi a cikin gini da masu lafiya na jama'a, musamman lokacin da suka shiga cikin alakar kusa (1 mita (3 ft) ko sama da haka).
hongkong ya bayyana sanya kariyar fuska a lokacin da ake amfani da zirga-zirgar jama’a ko a lokacin da ake zaune a wuraren da yawa.
Shugabannin lafiya na kasar Thailand suna goyon bayan mutane su yi masu kaya na kaya a gida da suka yi wasa su kowace rana.
Jamhuriyar Czech da Slovakia suka haramta shiga cikin jama’a ba tare da sanya kariyar fuska ko rufe maka hanci da baki ba.
A ranar 16 ga watan Maris, Vietnam ya bukatar kowa ya sanya kariyar fuska a lokacin da ke zuwa wuraren jama’a don kare kansu da wasu.
Gwamnatin Austriya ta ba da umarnin cewa duk wanda ya shiga cikin kasuwanci ya sanya kariyar fuska.
Isra’ila ta bukata a sanya kariyar fuska a cikin jama’a.

Taiwan, wanda ya samar da miliyan 10 na abin rufe fuskoki a kowace rana tun daga farkon Maris, ya bukatar mutanen da suka shiga cikin motocin jirgin kasa da motocin jirgin ƙasa su sanya kariyar fuska a ranar 1 ga Afrilu.
Panama ya sa abin rufe fuskoki a cikin jama’a, yayin da kuma ya bayyana cewa abin rufe fuskoki na iya samuwa a cikin gida.
Abin rufe fuskoki kuma ana amfani da su a Japan, Koriya ta Kudu, Malaysia, da Singapore.
Nisantar da jama'a (wanda kuma aka sani da nisantar da lafiya) ya haɗa da ayyukan lura da cutar da ke da niyyar rage yaduwar cutar ta hanyar ƙin ƙarfi tsakanin mutane.
Hanyoyin sun haɗa da karantawa; iyakar tafiya; da kuma rufe makarantu, wuraren aiki, filin wasa, gidajen wasan kwaikwayo ko wuraren cin abinci.
Mutane za su iya amfani da hanyoyin nisantar da jama'a ta hanyar zama a gida, kare tafiye-tafiye, nisantar yankuna masu yawan jama'a, amfani da saniya da kuma nisantar cudanya da wasu.
Yawancin gwamnatoci a halin yanzu suna ba da umarni ko shawarar walwala a yankunan da ke cikin cutar.

Matsakaicin yawan taro da aka amince da shi daga ƙungiyoyin gwamnatin Amurka da ƙungiyoyin lafiya ya karu daga 250 mutane (idan ba a san cutar COVID-19 a yanki ba) zuwa 50 mutane, da kuma zuwa 10 mutane.

A ranar 22 ga Maris 2020, Jamus ya haramta haɗin jama'a na fiye da biyu na mutane. Ayyukan jama'a na ƙasa sun haɗa da ayyukan daidaitawa irin su karantawa (wanda aka sani da umarni a gida, umarni a gida, ko kullewa) da oda. A ranar 2 ga watan Afrilu, sama da miliyan 300, ko kusan kashi 90% na yawan jama'a, suna cikin kullewa a Amurka, sama da miliyan 50 suna cikin kullewa a Philippines, kusan miliyan 59 suna cikin kullewa a Afirka ta Kudu, da miliyan 1.3 suna cikin kullewa a Indiya.
A ranar 26 ga Maris, sama da miliyan 1.7 na jama'a a duniya suna cikin rufe, wanda ya karu zuwa miliyan 2.6 na jama'a a ranar biyu bayan haka—kashi uku na yawan jama'ar duniya.
Lamarin farko na COVID-19 wanda aka tabbatar ya fara ne a ranar 1 ga Disamba 2019 a Wuhan; wani rahoton da ba a tabbatar da shi ba ya bayyana cewa lamarin farko ya fara ne a ranar 17 ga Nuwamba.

A cikin wani lokacin da aka bayyana a matsayin "rufewar mafi girma a tarihin mutane", an sanar da cordon sanitaire a ranar 23 ga watan Janairu, wanda ya hana tafiye-tafiye zuwa da daga cikin wuhan, wanda aka kara zuwa jimillar birane 15 a Hubei, wanda ya shafi jimillar mutane 57 miliyan.
Amfani da motocin kuɗi an haramta a birnin.
A wurare da yawa, bikin Shekara ta Sin (25 ga watan Janairu) an cire shi.
Hukumomin kuma sun sanar da cewa ake gina asibiti na tsawon lokaci, Huoshenshan Hospital, wanda aka kammala a cikin 10 rana.
Bayan haka, wani asibiti na ƙarshe an ƙirƙiri, Asibitin Leishenshan, don shawo kan marasa lafiya na ƙarshe.

Wannan ya haɗa da ayyukan gine-gine na musamman, Sin kuma ya canza 14 cibiyoyin da ke cikin Wuhan, ciki har da wuraren taro da filin wasa, a matsayin wuraren ajiya na lokaci guda. A ranar 26 ga Janairu, gwamnatin kasar ta tabbatar da matakai masu yawa don kiyaye barkewar COVID-19, ciki har da bayar da bayanai na lafiya ga masu shiga da tsawaita hutun lokacin bazara.
Jami'oi Da Makarantu a kewaye da Kasar a Rufe.

An tsara matakan aiki daga waje a yankunan Sin da dama.
Ƙuntatawa kan tafiya an yi a cikin da kuma wajen Hubei.
An canza zirga-zirgar jama'a, kuma an rufe makamantansu a China.

Hanyar shawarar ayyukan jama'a an yi amfani da ita a cikin manyan birane, kuma an ƙididdige cewa kusan mutane 760 miliyan (kusan kashi biyu na yawan jama'a) suka yi amfani da wani tsari na wucin gadi na wucin gadi. Gidan gwamnatin Amurka ya kasance an yi la’akari da shi saboda yin la’akari da matsalar da kuma kawar da bayyanar da bayanai ta hanyar ba da izini ga shugabannin lafiyar jama’a da masana kimiyya su kawo bayanai da bayanai masu alaƙa da kwayar cutar da ofishin shugaban kasa Mike Pence.
Kafin amincewa da shugaban kasa Trump na shugabancin rashin lafiya, ya kasance ya ƙunshi ƙungiyoyin siyasa.

Ana amfani da tsari na nishaɗi don ƙirƙirar da kuma ƙirƙirar tsarin yaduwa da aka buga a The Journal of Travel Medicine a tsakanin Janairu 2020.
A kan bayanan da aka yi a shekarar 2018 daga International Air Transport Association, Bangkok, Hong Kong, Tokyo, da Taipei suna da matsakaicin mutane daga Wuhan.
Dubai, Sydney, da Melbourne kuma an bayyana su a matsayin wuraren da ke da mahimmanci ga mutanen da suka shiga daga Wuhan.

Bali an bayyana a matsayin mafi yawan samun rahoton a cikin cibiyoyi 20 mafi yawan samun rahoton a cikin yanayin shirya, yayin da biranen a Ostiraliya an sanar da su a matsayin mafi yawan samun rahoton. Ostiraliya ta bayar da Shirin Yanayin Bincike don Cutar Coronavirus (COVID-19) a ranar 7 ga Fabrairu.
Tace cewa akwai abubuwa da yawa da ba a sani ba game da COVID-19, kuma cewa Australia zai nufi kan sarrafa iyaka da sadarwa a cikin yanayin da ya shafi cutar.
A ranar 21 ga watan Maris, aiki na lafiya ga mutane ya ayyana a Ostiraliya.

Bayan hanyar keɓewa da keɓewa na ƙasashen duniya a Wuhan da Hubei, ƙasashe da yawa sun ƙirƙiri aikin fitar da jama'a da ƙungiyoyin ƙasashen waje daga yankin, galibi ta hanyar hanyoyin da ake tsara a ƙasashen su, tare da hukumomin Sin suka ba da izini.
Kanada, Amurka, Japan, Indiya, Sri Lanka, Ostiraliya, Faransa, Argentina, Jamus, da kasar Thai ne suka kasance cikin farko suka shirya mayar da jama'ar su.
Pakistan ya ce ba zai aika baƙar fata daga Sin ba.
A ranar 7 ga watan Faburairu, Brazil ta kwashe 34 mutane na Brazil ko dangin su tare da mutane hudu na Poland, mutum ɗaya na China da mutum ɗaya na Indiya.
Jama'ar Poland, China, da Indiya suka shigo a Poland, inda jirgin Brazil ya shigo kafin ya ci gaba da hanyarsa zuwa Brazil.
Jama'ar Brazil da suka tafi Wuhan an keɓe su a filin soja a kusa da Brasília.
A wannan ranar, 215 Kanadiyya (176 daga jirgin farko, da 39 daga jirgin na biyu da aka siyar da shi ta gwamnatin Amurka) an keɓe su daga Wuhan zuwa CFB Trenton don keɓewa na biyu.
A ranar 11 ga watan Faburairu, jirgin 185 kanada daga Wuhan ya kai CFB Trenton.
Hukumomin australiya suka kebe mutane 277 a ranar 3 da 4 ga watan fabrairu zuwa gidan kebe da aka sake amfani da shi a matsayin wurin kebe, inda suka kasance tsawon kwanaki 14.

A jirgin da aka raba matafiya daga New Zealand ya kai ga Auckland a ranar 5 ga Fabrairu; matafiyansa (wanda suka hada da wasu daga Australia da Pacific) an raba su a cikin tashar jirgin ruwa a Whangaparoa, arewa maso gabas na Auckland.
A ranar 15 ga watan Faburairu, Amurka ta sanar da cewa za ta mayar da Amurkawa da ke cikin jirgin ruwa Diamond Princess.
A ranar 21 ga watan Faburairu, jirgin da ke dauke da mutane 129 na Kanada da aka mayar da su daga Diamond Princess ya kai Trenton, Ontario.

A cikin farkon Maris, gwamnatin Indiya ta fara mayar da mutanen ta daga Iran. A ranar 14 ga Maris, jirgin ruwa na South African Airways wanda gwamnatin Afirka ta Kudu ta mayar da shi ya mayar da 112 mutanen Afirka ta Kudu.
An gudanar da zanga-zangar lafiya kafin shiga, da kuma mutane hudu na Afirka ta Kudu da ke nuna alamun koronavirus an tsare su a wajen kawar da matsala.
Kawai mutanen Afirka ta Kudu waɗanda suka yi gwaji mara kyau suka dawo.

Fitar da sakamakon testun da aka yi ya dawo da duk mutanen Afirka ta Kudu, ciki har da masu kula da jirgin, jirgin sama, masu kula da otal, sojoji da sojojin da suka shiga aikin kare rayuwa wadanda, a matsayin wani bangare na aiki, duk suka ci gaba da cikakken aiki da keɓewa a otal din The Ranch Resort na tsawon lokacin rufewa na kwanaki 14.
A ranar 20 ga Maris, Amurka ta fara mayar da jami’an ta daga Iraq saboda cutar.
A ranar 5 ga watan Fabrairu, hukumar kiwon lafiya ta iran ta sanar da rufe jami’oi da ma makarantu cigaba da ilimi da makarantu a birane da dama da ma yankuna.

Dalibai na Sin a cibiyoyin karatun Amurka suka shiga cikin juna da suka taimaka wajen aika taimako zuwa yankunan Sin da ke cikin cutar, tare da kungiyar juna a yankin Chicago mai girma wanda aka tabbatar da cewa ya aika 50,000 N95 masu rufe fuskoki zuwa kasuwancin lafiya a yankin Hubei a ranar 30 ga watan Janairu. Hukumar taimako ta duniya ta Direct Relief, tare da FedEx, ta aika 200,000 masu rufe fuskoki da kayan kariya na sirri, ciki har da kafa da kuma kaya, ta hanyar jirgin saman aiki zuwa kasuwancin lafiya na Wuhan a ranar 30 ga watan Janairu.

A ranar 5 ga watan Faburairu, Bill da Melinda gates sun sanar da zuba jarin $100 miliyan ga hukumar lafiya ta duniya don tallafawa bincike da maganin cutar da kuma kare "yawan jama'a da ke cikin cutar a Afirka da Asiya ta kudu".
Interaksyon ya bayyana cewa gwamnatin Sin ta ba da 200,000 masks ga Filipinawa a ranar 6 ga watan Fabrairu, bayan Senataren Richard Gordon ya tuntuɓi 3.16 miliyan masks zuwa Wuhan.
A ranar 19 ga watan Faburairu, kungiyar Red Cross ta Singapore ta sanar da cewa za ta tura kudi $2.26 miliyan a cikin taimako zuwa kasar Sin.

Japan ya ba da lambobin rufe fuska miliyan ɗaya zuwa Wuhan, Turkiyya ta kawo kayayyakin kiwon lafiya, Rasha ta kawo sama da 13 ton na kayayyakin kiwon lafiya zuwa Wuhan, Malaysia ta bayyana cewa ta ba da lambobin rufe fuska miliyan 18 zuwa kasar Sin, Jamus ya kawo kayayyakin kiwon lafiya daban-daban ciki har da 10,000 Hazmat suits, da kuma Amurka ta ba da kayayyakin kiwon lafiya 17.8 tons zuwa kasar Sin da ta yi watsi da $100 miliyan a cikin tallafin kuɗi zuwa kasashen da suka shafi bayan damu’oi a kasar Sin suka shafi, bayan da kasar Sin ta shafi damu’oi, kasar Sin ta ba da tallafi zuwa kasashen da suka shafi.
A watan Maris, Sin, Cuba da Rasha suka taimaka wa Italiya ta samar da kayayyakin lafiya da masana don taimakawa Italiya ta mayar da martani kan barkewar cutar coronavirus.
Dan kasuwanci Jack Ma ya aika 1.1 million testing kits, 6 million face masks, da 60,000 protective suits zuwa Addis Ababa, Ethiopia don aika su ta hanyar Majalisar Afirka.
Ya kuma aika 5,000 kit na gwajin, 100,000 abin rufe fuskoki da 5 ventilators zuwa Panama.
Ma kuma ya bayar da kayayyakin kiwon lafiya zuwa Kanada. Netherlands, Spain, Turkey, Georgia, da Jamhuriyar Czech sun bayyana matsayinsu game da masu siffar China da gwajin kit.

Misali, Spain ya ɗauki 58,000 kit na testin cutar ta COVID-19 da aka yi a China, wanda ya daidaita ɓangarorin daidaituwa da 30%, a cikin wannan lokacin, Netherlands ya ɗauki 600,000 abin rufe fuskoki da aka yi a China, wanda ya daidaita ɓangarorin daidaituwa.
Belgium ya ɗauki 100,000 masu amfani ba daidai ba, wanda aka yi imanin cewa daga China, amma a cikin Colombia.
A wata gefe, taimako na Sinanci ya samu nasara a yankunan Amurka ta Kudu da Afirka. A ranar 2 ga Afrilu, Bankin Duniya ya fara aikace-aikacen taimako na zanga-zanga don kasashe masu ci gaba.
WHO ya ba da shawarar ayyukan hukumomin kasar Sin a gudanar da da hana barkewar cutar.

Kungiyar lafiyar duniya ta nuna bambanta tsakanin barkewar cutar SARS na 2002-2004, inda hukumomin kasar China suka kasance a cikin sirri wanda ya hana hanyoyin karewa da karewa, da wannan barkewar cuta inda gwamnatin kasa "ta bayyana a cikin lokaci don hana cutarwa a cikin ranar kwanaki na shekara".

A ranar 23 ga Janairu, a wuri da hukumomin tsakiya suka yanke shawarar aika hannu a Wuhan, mai wakiltar WHO Gauden Galea ya bayyana cewa ba shi da "shaida ce ta hukumar WHO" ba, amma kuma "shaida ce mai mahimmanci a matsayin bayanin ci gaba da kiyaye barkewar cutar a wurin da take yaduwa" kuma ya sanya shi a matsayin "matsala a tarihin lafiyar jama'a".
Shugaban hukumar WHO Tedros Adhanom ya ce PHEIC ya kamata ne saboda "haɗarin yaduwar duniya, musamman zuwa ƙasashen da ba su da tsarin lafiya mai kyau.

A ranar 5 ga watan Fabrairu, WHO ya buƙatar cikakken al'ummar duniya don bayar da $ 675 miliyan don tallafin sarrafawa a ƙasashe masu rinjaye, yana nuna hankalin don taimakawa wa ƙasashe masu rinjaye waɗanda "ba su da tsarin da za su iya gano mutanen da suka sami cutarwa, kuma idan ya fito".
Tedros kuma ya yi bayanin da ya bayyana cewa "muna cikin matsakaicin matsakaicin" da kuma ya buƙatar jama'ar ƙasa da ƙasa su "karɓi yanzu ko ayyana da yawa bayan nan".

Wannan ya haifar da aikin Tawagar Gudanar da Bala'i ta Majalisar Dinkin Duniya, wanda ya ba da damar tsarin aikin Majalisar Dinkin Duniya, wanda kungiyar WHO ta ce zai iya "fara da martanin kiwon lafiya, yayin da kungiyoyin sauran kungiyoyi za su iya amfani da shawarar su a cikin tasirin zamantakewa, kuɗi da haɓakawa na bala'i".

Ta hanyar real-time reverse transcription polymerase chain reaction (rRT-PCR) ana iya aikata wannan aikin a samfurori na hankali da aka samu ta hanyoyi da dama, ciki har da nasopharyngeal swab ko samfurin sputum.
Matsayin da ake samu ana iya samun shi a cikin sa'o'i ɗaya zuwa 2 kwanaki.
Gwajin RT-PCR da aka yi tare da makogwaron wanda aka shigar ta hanci ba shi da aminci a cikin mako na farko na cutar.
Bayan haka kwayar cutar zai iya ƙarewa a makogwaro yayin da ta ci gaba da haɓaka a jini.

Don mutanen da suke cutarwa da aka gwada a matsayin na biyu, kuma samfurin kwayoyin halitta na iya karɓa daga hanyoyin ruwa na tsawon lokaci ta hanyar sukkawa ko kuma samfurin cutarwa (sputum) na iya amfani.

Wani daga cikin wadannan kwayoyin halitta na farko an yi a Charité a Berlin a watan Janairu shekarar 2020 ta amfani da real-time reverse transcription polymerase chain reaction (rRT-PCR), kuma ya kasance asusun 250,000 na kwayoyin halitta don aika da hukumar lafiya ta duniya (WHO).

In Babu Ruwa da Sabulu, hannu za a wanke da gashi. Hukumar Lafiya Ta Duniya ta shawarci wanke hannu:
Bayan, a lokacin, da bayan samar da abinci.
Bayan kuma kafin kulawa da mutum mai yaduwa.
Bayan da aka canza ƙwayoyi ko kula da ɗan ƙaramin ɗan ƙaramin da ya amfani da waje.

Tsafta hannu na lafiya ya nufi ayyukan tsafta da suka shafi ayyukan lafiya.
Wanke hannu kafin a yi amfani da magani ko kulawar likita na iya hana ko kawo karuwar yaduwar cuta.

Wanke hannu na inganci na ƙarshe don sauke hannun ka daga cututtuka (cututtuka, cututtuka, ko cututtuka na microorganisms da za su iya haifar da cututtuka) da abubuwan da za su iya haifar da matsala ko cututtuka.
Wannan yana da mahimmanci musamman ga mutanen da suke shigo da abinci ko aiki a fannin lafiya, amma kuma aiki mai mahimmanci ga jama'a.
Yi wanka da hannu yana da masarufi da dama, ciki har da kawo tsananin yaduwar cutar mura, coronavirus, da sauran cututtukan yaduwa; kawo tsananin yaduwar cututtukan da suka haifar da ruwan jini;
da kuma kawar da yawan mutuwar yara a cikin gida.

ACE2 mRNA expression kuma ana samu a cikin cerebral cortex, striatum, hypothalamus, da brainstem.
Aikin farko na ACE2 shine aiki a matsayin aikin daidaita ACE.
ACE ya kunna angiotensin I hormone a cikin angiotensin II.

ACE2 kuma yana kunna carboxyl-terminal amino acid phenylalanine daga angiotensin II (Asp-Arg-Val-Tyr-Ile-His-Pro-Phe) da hydrolyses shi zuwa vasodilator angiotensin (1-7), (H-Asp-Arg-Val-Tyr-Ile-His-Pro-OH).
ACE2 na iya manne da ƙungiyoyin da dama na peptides ciki har da [des-Arg9]-bradykinin, apelin, neurotensin, dynorphin A, da ghrelin.
ACE2 kuma yana da alaƙa da furotin da ake amfani da shi a cikin ƙwayar cuta ta neutral amino acid transporter SLC6A19 kuma ana ɗaukar shi a cikin Hartnup's disease.

A matsayin protein na transmembrane, ACE2 yana da matsayin babban hanyar shiga cikin kwayar cutar corona, ciki har da HCoV-NL63; SARS-CoV (cutar da ke haifar da SARS); da SARS-CoV-2 (cutar da ke haifar da COVID-19).

A cikin sauri, rataya na S1 protein na SARS-CoV da SARS-CoV2 zuwa yanki na enzymatic na ACE2 a saman kwayoyin halitta yana haifar da endocytosis da translocation na kwayar cuta da enzyme zuwa endosomes da ke cikin kwayoyin halitta.

Bugu da kari, kungiyoyin masu sana'a da manyan hukumomi da suka amince da ci gaban ACE inhibitor da ARB therapy.

A tsarin kwalliya da meta-analysis da aka buga a ranar 11 ga Yuli, 2012, ya gano cewar "amfani da ACE inhibitors ya kasance yana da alaka da ragin 34% na haɗarin cutar huhu idan aka kwatanta da masu kula da shi."
Kuma, "haɗarin pneumonia kuma an rage a cikin marasa lafiya da aka yi amfani da ACE inhibitors waɗanda ke cikin haɗari na pneumonia, musamman waɗanda ke da ciwon jini da ciwon jini.
Amfani da ACE inhibitors kuma yana da alaka da raguwar mutuwar da ke da alaƙa da cutar sanyi, amma sakamakon sun kasance mafi girma fiye da kawai haɗarin cutar sanyi.

Fuska I-II na gwaji ya yi gwajin farko kan lafiya da tasirin jinyawa, ya kasance a cikin yanayin da aka tsara, da kuma a cikin wuraren da dama, yayin da yake tabbatar da dosar daidaituwa da tasiri.

Gwajin zagaye na III galibi ya haɗa da masu shiga da yawa, ciki har da ƙungiyar tsaro, da ke nuna tasirin alurar rigakafi don hana cutar, yayin da ake kiyaye tasirin abubuwan da suka shafi lafiya a cikin dole.

ya zuwa ga 2020, babu maganin da ya dace ko rigakafi na SARS wanda ya nuna cewa ya fi dacewa da aminci da kuma fi dacewa a cikin mutane.

Kamar yadda takardun bincike da aka buga a 2005 da 2006, haɓaka rigakafin rigakafin da magunguna don maganin SARS ya kasance matsala ga gwamnatoci da hukumomin lafiyar jama'a a fadin duniya. Babu kuma wani rigakafin da aka tabbatar da shi game da MERS.
Idan MERS ya zama mafi girma, an san cewa binciken SARS na da alaƙa da yawa ya iya samar da tsari mai amfani don haɓaka rigakafin da magunguna da suka shafi cutar MERS-CoV.

A ranar Maris 2020, akwai daya (DNA-based) MERS vaccine wanda ya kammala ayyukan fasaha na farko a cikin mutane, da sauran uku da ke aiki, duk da cewa duk wadannan ne viral-vectored vaccines, biyu adenoviral-vectored (ChAdOx1-MERS, BVRS-GamVac), da wani MVA-vectored (MVA-MERS-S).

Coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19) shine cutar da aka haɗa da ita ta cutar hanyar numfashi ta syndrome acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2).

Akwai tabbacin daidaituwa don ingancin remdesivir, a ranar Maris shekarar 2020.
Gwaji ya nuna ci gaban lafiya a cikin marasa lafiya masu amfani da remdesivir.

gwajin zagaye na III na gwajin jinya ana aiki dasu a Amurka, China da Italiya. Chloroquine, wanda aka amfani dasu kafin haka don maganin zazzabin cizon sauro, ana aiki dasu a China a watan Fabrairu 2020, tare da sakamakon fari.
Kodayake, akwai tambayoyi don aikin bincike.
Hukumar lafiya ta Koriya da Sinawa sun shawarta amfani da Chloroquine.
Duk da haka, Cibiyar Virology ta Wuhan, wacce ta tabbatar da shan maganin kowace rana na gram 1, ta bayyana cewa shan maganin da ke da yawa zai kasance mai tsanani kuma zai iya haifar da mutuwa.

A ranar 28 ga Maris 2020, FDA ya ba da izinin amfani da shi a matsayin amfani da hydroxychloroquine da chloroquine a hannun doctars wajen warkar da masu cutar covid 19. Kungiyar 7 ta kasar Sin ta yi amfani da interferon, ribavirin ko umifenovir don amfani da shi a cikin cutar covid 19.
Bayanan da aka yi na farko sun nuna cewa babban adadin ribavirin zai zama dole don hana SARS-CoV-2 in vitro.
